segments.text: What are you listening now , Fred ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey ! Man , put your earphone out . I said which song you are listening to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jay Chou's title song in his new album .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's your comment on his new album ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gorgeous ! There is another song combining Chinese and western music styles . I am crazy for it , so I hear it over and again . And I plan to make it as the ringbone of my mobile .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose this song can be the No . 1 on the top chart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I cann't wait for buying his CD now .
segments.speaker: S1
